name: Drinking with Friends
description:
A free little drinking game for you and a friend... or to play against yourself while your drunk.  Have fun! 

**********************************

CONTROLS

**********************************

PLAYER 1

W: move forward

S: move backward

[secret controls]

A: push left

D: push right

PLAYER 2

UpArrow: move forward

DownArrow: move backward

[secret controls]

LeftArrow: push left

RightArrow: push right

**********************************

OTHER CONTROLS

ESC: Quit (quitting is for losers)

Ctrl + R: Restart

[: speed down

]: speed up

I: move players in

O: move players out

**********************************

Check out our other fine creations

HakJak.com
